Class OrderBLL

java.lang.Object
BussinessLogic.OrderBLL
public class OrderBLL extends Object
Business Logic Layer class that handles operations related to orders It communicates with the OrderDAO for database access and generates a Bill for each order

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderBLL()
    Constructs an OrderBLL and initializes the OrderDAO

      Returns:
      the Order object if found
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if the order with the given ID does not exist

    • generateBill

      public void generateBill(Order order, Client client, Product product)
      Generates a Bill object based on a given order, client, and product The bill is inserted into the 'log' table
      Parameters:
      order - the order details
      client - the client who placed the order
      product - the product included in the order
